level.heading: Application and license fees.
level.text: At the time of filing an application under this chapter, each applicant shall pay to the Superintendent a non-refundable license fee of $300, except that an applicant for a license to maintain one or more limited stations shall pay the non-refundable limited station license application fee as provided in § 26- 314.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-301.
